ability.name: Pick a Card
ability.desc: Twisted Fate throws a card that either stuns, deals damage around his target, or restores mana to himself and nearby allies

ability.name: Divine Judgement
ability.desc: Kayle shields the weakest ally, making them immune to damage

ability.name: Explosive Charge
ability.desc: Tristana places a bomb on her current target that detonates after 3 attacks, damaging nearby enemies

ability.name: Infinite Duress
ability.desc: Warwick pounces onto the lowest health enemy, stunning them for @Duration@s, damaging them, and healing himself. Applies on-hit effects.

ability.name: Bullet Time
ability.desc: Miss Fortune channels for @ChannelDuration@s, firing several waves of bullets damaging enemies in a cone

ability.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
ability.desc: Ashe fires an arrow that stuns and damages the farthest enemy. The stun is longer the farther the enemy

ability.name: Soul Shackles
ability.desc: Morgana fires chains to nearby enemies, dealing damage and stunning after a short delay if they are still nearby

ability.name: Last Caress
ability.desc: Evelynn deals damage to the 3 closest enemies and teleports away. Damage is increased against low health enemies

ability.name: Requiem
ability.desc: Karthus deals damage to @NumberOfTargets@ random enemies after a long channel

ability.name: Rupture
ability.desc: Cho'gath ruptures an area, stunning and damaging enemies inside of it

ability.name: Glacial Storm
ability.desc: Anivia channels a large hailstorm, damaging and slowing the attack speed of enemies inside of it

ability.name: Nether Blade
ability.desc: Kassadin's attacks steal mana from enemies, converting it into a shield that lasts for @ShieldDuration@s

ability.name: Powder Kegs
ability.desc: Gangplank periodically creates barrels. On cast, Gangplank detonates the barrels, damaging nearby enemies. Applies on hit effects.

ability.name: Primordial Burst
ability.desc: Veigar blasts an enemy with magical energy, dealing damage. This spell instantly kills if the enemy is a lower star level than Veigar

ability.name: Demonflare
ability.desc: Swain transforms, draining health from all nearby enemies. At the end of his transformation, Swain sends out a burst of energy dealing damage to nearby enemies

ability.name: Rocket Grab
ability.desc: Blitzcrank pulls the furthest enemy to him and stuns them for @StunDuration@s

ability.name: Death Lotus
ability.desc: Katarina channels for @Duration@s and fires daggers at @NumberOfTargets@ nearby enemies, dealing damage and reducing healing

ability.name: Spider Form
ability.desc: Elise summons Spiderlings and transforms, gaining Lifesteal

ability.name: Pyroclasm
ability.desc: Brand launches a bouncing fireball, damaging enemies hit

ability.name: Silver Bolts
ability.desc: Innate: Vayne deals bonus true damage every third attack based on the enemy's maximum health

ability.name: Primal Surge
ability.desc: Nidalee heals herself and the weakest ally, then transforms gaining Attack Damage

ability.name: Keeper's Verdict
ability.desc: Poppy swings her hammer, damaging and knocking up the closest enemy

ability.name: Obliterate
ability.desc: Mordekaiser slams his mace in front him, dealing damage to two enemies in a line

ability.name: Five Point Strike
ability.desc: Akali throws kunai at her target, dealing damage. This spell can critically strike

ability.name: Slicing Maelstrom
ability.desc: Kennen summons a storm around him, dealing damage and stunning enemies inside of it for @StunDuration@s

ability.name: Judgement
ability.desc: Garen spins his sword around for @SpinDuration@s, becoming immune to magic damage and dealing damage to nearby enemies

ability.name: Solar Flare
ability.desc: Leona calls down a solar ray that damages and slows enemies inside it. The enemy in the center is stunned

ability.name: Spirit's Refuge
ability.desc: Shen creates a zone around himself, allowing allies inside to dodge all attacks

ability.name: Dragon's Descent
ability.desc: Shyvana dashes and transforms, gaining Attack Damage and Attack Range. When transformed, her attacks set enemies on fire

ability.name: Orb of Deception
ability.desc: Ahri fires an orb in a line that returns to her, damaging enemies it passes through

ability.name: Buckshot
ability.desc: Innate: Graves' attacks deal increased damage and hit all enemies in front of him

ability.name: Thunder Claws
ability.desc: Volibear empowers his attacks to chain between enemies, applying on-hit effects

ability.name: Savagery
ability.desc: Rengar leaps to the lowest health enemy and stabs them for bonus on-hit damage. After dealing damage, Rengar gains Attack Speed and @CritBuff*100@% Critical Strike Chance

ability.name: Piercing Arrow
ability.desc: Varus charges and fires an arrow, dealing damage to all enemies in a line

ability.name: Glacial Prison
ability.desc: Sejuani creates a large glacial storm, stunning enemies within it after a short delay

ability.name: Riposte
ability.desc: Fiora becomes immune to damage and spells. After a short delay, she stuns and damages the closest enemy

ability.name: Wild Growth
ability.desc: Lulu grants an ally bonus Health, knocking up enemies near them for @CCDuration@s

ability.name: Spinning Axes
ability.desc: Draven gains Spinning Axes, dealing bonus on-hit damage. Stacks up to two times

ability.name: Taste their Fear
ability.desc: Kha'Zix slashes the closest enemy, dealing bonus damage to enemies that are alone

ability.name: Decimate
ability.desc: Darius swings his axe, damaging nearby enemies and healing himself based off enemies hit

ability.name: Frozen Tomb
ability.desc: Lissandra encases the target in ice for @EnemyStunDuration@s, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Below half HP, Lissandra instead encases herself, becoming untargetable for @SelfDuration@s

ability.name: Voice of Light
ability.desc: Aurelion Sol breathes a large blast of fire in a line, dealing damage to enemies

ability.name: GNAR!
ability.desc: Gnar transforms, gaining Health, Attack Damage and jumping behind the furthest enemy, damaging and stunning enemies nearby for @RCCDuration@s

ability.name: Tempest Steel
ability.desc:
Yasuo stabs forward, damaging two enemies in a line. On third cast, Yasuo instead launches a tornado dealing damage and knocking up enemies in a line for @QKnockupDuration@s.

Applies on hit effects.

ability.name: Unbreakable
ability.desc: Braum gains a barrier that blocks incoming damage

ability.name: Lamb's Respite
ability.desc: Kindred creates a zone around herself that prevents allies from dying

ability.name: Relentless Pursuit
ability.desc: Lucian dashes away to safety and attacks an enemy twice, once with Attack Damage and once with Spell Damage

ability.name: Razor Shuriken
ability.desc: Zed throws a shuriken, dealing damage to enemies in a line

ability.name: The Darkin Blade
ability.desc: Aatrox cleaves the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemies inside it

ability.name: Burrow
ability.desc: Rek'Sai burrows for a short duration becoming untargetable and healing. When Rek'Sai unburrows she deals damage and knocks up the closest enemy for @KnockUpDuration@s

ability.name: Phantom Undertow
ability.desc: Pyke dashes behind the furthest enemy, creating an afterimage that stuns enemies it passes through

traits.name: Pirate
traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) At the end of combat against another player, gain up to 4 additional gold</row>

traits.name: Elementalist
traits.desc:
Innate: Elementalists gain double mana from attacks

(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, summon a Golem

traits.name: Demon
traits.desc:
Attacks from Demons have a chance to burn all of an enemy's mana and deal true damage equal to mana burned

(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% Chance to Mana Burn

traits.name: Wild
traits.desc:
Attacks generate stacks of Fury (stacks up to 5 times). Each stack of Fury gives @AttackSpeedPercent@ Attack Speed

(@MinUnits@) Wild Allies Only
(@MinUnits@) All Allies

traits.name: Void
traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Void champions now deal true damage</row>

traits.name: Brawler
traits.desc:
Brawlers gain bonus maximum health

(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ Bonus Health

traits.name: Dragon
traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Dragons gain immunity to Magic Damage</row>

traits.name: Exile
traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain a shield equal to @ShieldPercent@% of their maximum Health</row>

traits.name: Yordle
traits.desc:
Yordles gain a chance to dodge enemy attacks

(@MinUnits@) @MissPercent@% Chance to Dodge

traits.name: Guardian
traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Trigger: At the start of combat, Guardians grants +@Armor@ Armor to adjacent allies. This Armor can stack.</row>

traits.name: Knight
traits.desc:
All allies block damage taken

(@MinUnits@) @BlockAmount@ Damage Blocked

traits.name: Ninja
traits.desc:
The Ninja Trait is only active when you have *exactly* 1 or all 4 Ninjas

(@MinUnits@) Ninja gains +@ADValue@ Attack Damage & +@APValue@% Spell Power
(@MinUnits@) All Ninjas gain +@ADValue@ Attack Damage & +@APValue@% Spell Power

traits.name: Ranger
traits.desc:
Rangers gain a chance to double their attack speed every @ProcRate@s for the next @ProcRate@s

(@MinUnits@) @ProcPercent@% Chance to Double Attack Speed

traits.name: Shapeshifter
traits.desc:
Shapeshifters gain bonus maximum Health when they transform

(@MinUnits@) @HPPercent@% Bonus Maximum Health

traits.name: Gunslinger
traits.desc:
Gunslinger attacks gain a @ProcPercent@% to trigger additional attacks on-hit

(@MinUnits@) Attack @ExtraTargetsHit@ extra enemies
(@MinUnits@) Attack @ExtraTargetsHit@ extra enemies
(@MinUnits@) Attack @ExtraTargetsHit@ extra enemies

traits.name: Sorcerer
traits.desc:
Innate: Sorcerers gain double mana from attacks

All Allies have increased Spell Power

(@MinUnits@) +@AP@% Spell Power

traits.name: Robot
traits.desc: (@MinUnits@) Robots start combat at full mana

traits.name: Phantom
traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, curse a random enemy and set their HP to @HPToSet@</row>

traits.name: Noble
traits.desc:
Gain +@Armor@ Armor, +@MagicResist@ Magic Resistance, and heal @Heal@ health on-hit

(@MinUnits@) 1 Random Ally
(@MinUnits@) All Allies

traits.name: Assassin
traits.desc:
Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the farthest enemy

Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage

(@MinUnits@) +@CritAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Damage

traits.name: Glacial
traits.desc:
Glacial attacks gain a chance to stun enemies for @StunDuration@s

(@MinUnits@) @ProcPercent@% Chance to Stun

traits.name: Imperial
traits.desc:
Gain Double Damage

(@MinUnits@) 1 Random Imperial
(@MinUnits@) All Imperials

traits.name: Blademaster
traits.desc:
Blademaster attacks have a @ProcChance@% chance to trigger additional attacks on-hit

(@MinUnits@) One Additional Attack
(@MinUnits@) Two Additional Attacks
(@MinUnits@) Four Additional Attacks

12.name: Sword of the Divine
12.desc: Each second, the wearer has a @ChanceToProc@% chance to gain 100% Critical Strike

13.name: Hextech Gunblade
13.desc: Heal for @OmniVamp@% of all damage dealt

14.name: Spear of Shojin
14.desc: After casting, wearer gains @ManaPercentRestore@% of its max Mana per attack

17.name: Zeke's Herald
17.desc: At the start of combat, allies within @HexRange@ hexes in the same row gain +@AttackSpeed@% Attack Speed for the rest of combat

22.name: Rapid Firecannon
22.desc: Wearer's attacks cannot be dodged. Attack Range is doubled

23.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
23.desc: Attacks grant @AttackSpeedPerStack@% Attack Speed.  Stacks infinitely

24.name: Statikk Shiv
24.desc: Every 3rd attack deals @Damage@ magical damage to @BouncesTooltip@ enemies.

26.name: Cursed Blade
26.desc: Attacks on-hit have a low chance to reduce enemy's star level by 1 for the rest of combat

27.name: Titanic Hydra
27.desc: Attacks deal @MaxHealth@% of the wearer's max Health as splash damage

33.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
33.desc: Wearer's Spell Power stat is amplified by @APPercentAmp@%

34.name: Luden's Echo
34.desc: Spells deal @Damage@ splash damage on hit

35.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
35.desc: At the start of combat, allies within @HexRange@ hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks @ShieldValue@ damage.

36.name: Ionic Spark
36.desc: Whenever an enemy casts a spell, they take @Damage@ damage

37.name: Morellonomicon
37.desc: Spells deal burn damage equal to @BurnPercent@% of the enemy's maximum health over @BurnDuration@s and prevent healing

46.name: Hush
46.desc: Attacks on-hit have a high chance to silence, preventing the enemy from casting spells for @SilenceDuration@s

47.name: Redemption
47.desc: On crossing below @HPThreshold@% Health, heal all nearby allies for @HealthRestore@ Health

55.name: Thornmail
55.desc: Reflect @DamageReflect@% of damage mitigated from attacks

56.name: Sword Breaker
56.desc: Attacks have a chance to disarm for @DisarmDuration@s

57.name: Red Buff
57.desc: Attacks deal @BurnPercent@% of the enemy's maximum Health as burn damage over @BurnDuration@s and prevent healing

67.name: Zephyr
67.desc: On start of combat, banish an enemy for @BanishDuration@ seconds

68.name: Runaan's Hurricane
68.desc:
Extra %i:scaleMR% +@ExtraMR@
Summon a spirit who mirrors your attacks, dealing @MultiplierForDamage@% Damage

77.name: Warmog's Armor
77.desc: Wearer regenerates @HealthRegen@% missing Health per second
